verses.name: Leviticus 11:5
verses.text: And the coney, because he cheweth the cud, but divideth not the hoof; he is unclean unto you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:6
verses.text: And the hare, because he cheweth the cud, but divideth not the hoof; he is unclean unto you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:7
verses.text: And the swine, though he divide the hoof, and be clovenfooted, yet he cheweth not the cud; he is unclean to you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:8
verses.text: Of their flesh shall ye not eat, and their carcase shall ye not touch; they are unclean to you.
